name: MakurTea
description:
First Trijam of the RedSoft's main game dev team.  Made in 4 hours.  PLAY IN FULL SCREEN !

You are a Tea Maker !!! Take the right ingredients by following the recipe on your left to become a Tea Master !

PLAY ON FULLSCREEN !!!

A game made by :
Transarc (code)
Toudji (visual)
Epercatap (audio)
